13
14/*! \file isc/assertions.h
15 */
16
17#ifndef ISC_ASSERTIONS_H
18#define ISC_ASSERTIONS_H 1
19
20#include <isc/lang.h>
21#include <isc/likely.h>
22#include <isc/platform.h>
23
24ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
25
26/*% isc assertion type */
27typedef enum {
28 isc_assertiontype_require,
29 isc_assertiontype_ensure,
30 isc_assertiontype_insist,
31 isc_assertiontype_invariant
32} isc_assertiontype_t;
33
34typedef void (*isc_assertioncallback_t)(const char *, int, isc_assertiontype_t,
35 const char *);
36
37/* coverity[+kill] */
38ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE
39void isc_assertion_failed(const char *, int, isc_assertiontype_t,
40 const char *) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
41
42void
43isc_assertion_setcallback(isc_assertioncallback_t);
44
45const char *
46isc_assertion_typetotext(isc_assertiontype_t type);
47
48#define ISC_REQUIRE(cond) \
49 ((void) (/*CONSTCOND*/ISC_LIKELY(cond) || \
50 ((isc_assertion_failed)(__FILE__, __LINE__, \
51 isc_assertiontype_require, \
52 #cond), 0)))
53
54#define ISC_ENSURE(cond) \
55 ((void) (/*CONSTCOND*/ISC_LIKELY(cond) || \
56 ((isc_assertion_failed)(__FILE__, __LINE__, \
57 isc_assertiontype_ensure, \
58 #cond), 0)))
59
60#define ISC_INSIST(cond) \
61 ((void) (/*CONSTCOND*/ISC_LIKELY(cond) || \
62 ((isc_assertion_failed)(__FILE__, __LINE__, \
63 isc_assertiontype_insist, \
64 #cond), 0)))
65
66#define ISC_INVARIANT(cond) \
67 ((void) (/*CONSTCOND*/ISC_LIKELY(cond) || \
68 ((isc_assertion_failed)(__FILE__, __LINE__, \
69 isc_assertiontype_invariant, \
70 #cond), 0)))
71
72ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
73
74#endif /* ISC_ASSERTIONS_H */
75
